translation: He who sees the Supreme Lord existing truly in all beings, the imperishable within the perishable, sees indeed.
commentary: 13.28 Samm eally? in all (in) all? in beings in beings? standing existing? God the Supreme Lord? Vinshyastu among the perishing? indestructible the unperishing? who who? sees sees? He he? sees sees.Commentary He who beholds the Supreme Lord through the inner eye of wisdom? He Who is seated in all beings from the Creator down to the unmoving objects and Who is not destroyed even when all beings
